name: Adam Smith
learned: Adam Smith is a philosopher who loves to explore different ideas. He is always looking for ways to challenge peopleâ€™s preconceptions.
currently: Adam Smith is writing a book about the importance of creativity and how it can shape the world. Adam is also curious about who will be running for the local mayor election next month.
lifestyle: Adam Smith goes to bed around 8pm, awakes up around 4am, eats dinner around 5pm.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 4:00 am
spend 2 hours writing for his book from 5:00 am to 7:00 am
go for a morning walk from 7:00 am to 8:00 am
attend a local political event or do research on the candidates running for mayor from 9:00 am to 11:00 am
continue writing for his book from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm
go for a bike ride or read a book from 2:00 pm to 4:00 pm
